title: Project Learning Design Integrating Malay Ethnoscience and Machine Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics concepts and foundational understanding of data analysis
context.additional_context: Development of culture-contextualized STEM education models integrating traditional scientific knowledge from Jambi, Indonesia with machine learning

learning_goals: Learners identify and explain the physical principles embedded in Malay traditional architecture (e.g., stilt houses) and culinary methods.
Learners design personalized PBL strategies tailored to learner characteristics using educational data mining.
Learners develop machine learning models (e.g., predicting traditional sustainability indicators) integrating ethnoscience elements.
Learners improve culturally contextualized project outcomes through peer assessment and formative evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
